page.title: 09Family Life in Scunthorpe
page.content: I have five people in my family. Me, Amanda, my two brothers Andrew and Neil, and my mum and dad, Jill and John. We live in a semi-detatched house in Scunthorpe. My dad works at Scunthorpe {Steel Works,}my mum works at Scunthorpe Police Station as a{typist, Neil is a{plumber}and Andrew is an {engineer.}I have three{pets:}a budgie, a cat and a goldfish. I get Â£1.50 {pocket money}every week; Andrew and Neil don't get pocket money because they are both working full time. We don't go out much together but once a year we all go on{holiday together and enjoy ourselves. My dad does{shift work}so he does all the cooking and some of the cleaning while mum's at work. We are a very happy family and we enjoy life.
